TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

Docs.summary: Prompts the user to choose a font from among those installed on the local computer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 继承的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>必须调用以创建此特定的公共对话框。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A> 可以重写以实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。
创建的实例时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>，一些读/写属性被设置为初始值。 有关这些值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>以显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>。 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已创建具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和在其上放置的按钮。 它还要求`fontDialog1`已创建。 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>包含大小信息，但不是颜色信息。
[!code-cpp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 创建的实例时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>，初始化以下的读/写属性。
|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowSimulations%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowVectorFonts%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowVerticalFonts%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowScriptChange%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Color%2A>|`Color.Black`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FixedPitchOnly%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ScriptsOnly%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowApply%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowColor%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowEffects%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowHelp%2A>|`false`|
可以更改任何这些属性通过单独调用属性的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowScriptChange { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowScriptChange : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can change the character set specified in the **Script** combo box to display a character set other than the one currently displayed.
Docs.value: 如果用户可以更改设置中指定的字符 * * 脚本 * * 组合框;否则为。 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks **脚本**组合框上找到**字体**对话框包含与所选字体的字符集。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowSimulations { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowSimulations : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows graphics device interface (GDI) font simulations.
Docs.value: 如果允许字体模拟;否则为。 默认值为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowVectorFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowVectorFonts : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows vector font selections.
Docs.value: 如果允许矢量字体;否则为。 默认值为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowVerticalFonts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowVerticalFonts : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays both vertical and horizontal fonts or only horizontal fonts.
Docs.value: 如果垂直和水平字体都允许;否则为。 默认值为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Apply As EventHandler

Docs.summary: Occurs when the user clicks the **Apply** button in the font dialog box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每次**Apply**单击按钮时，另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Apply>引发事件。
有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowEffects%2A>并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FontMustExist%2A>成员和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Apply>事件。 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，一个窗体，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>名为`FontDialog1`和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Button1`。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Docs.value: 选定字体的颜色。 默认值为 。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box specifies an error condition if the user attempts to select a font or style that does not exist.

## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowEffects%2A>并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FontMustExist%2A>成员和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Apply>事件。 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，一个窗体，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>名为`FontDialog1`和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Button1`。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int HookProc(native int hWnd, int32 msg, native int wparam, native int lparam) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: override IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

Docs.param: The handle to the dialog box window.
Docs.summary: Specifies the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.
Docs.returns: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 挂钩过程是一种机制，通过该函数可以截获事件到达应用程序之前。 当您重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.HookProc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog>类中，操作系统将调用要将操作系统消息发送到窗口的函数的重写。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.HookProc%2A>方法。 此示例由继承的类组成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>类。 在类的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.HookProc%2A>重写时，该示例的计算结果的方法`msg`参数与常量值的特定 Windows 消息。 如果`msg`参数等于指定的常量，该示例将写入跟踪输出标识 Windows 消息传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.HookProc%2A>方法。 此示例需要在其中类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.HookProc%2A>方法声明继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>类。
[!code-cpp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CPP/fontdialogoverride.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CS/fontdialogoverride.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/VB/fontdialogoverride.vb#1)]

block.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxSize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum point size a user can select.
Docs.value: 用户可选择的最大磅值。 默认值为 0。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 为最大和最小大小设置才会生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>必须大于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>，都必须为大于 0。
尝试将此属性设置为小于 0 的值将导致正在使用的 0 值。 如果您设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>的值小于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>。 设置的效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>为相同的值是限制到单个字体大小的大小选择。
点大小为 0 时，没有字体大小限制。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowEffects%2A>并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FontMustExist%2A>成员和处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Apply>事件。 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，一个窗体，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>名为`FontDialog1`和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名为`Button1`。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/VB/form1.vb#1)]

member this.MinSize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum point size a user can select.
Docs.value: 用户可选择的最小磅值。 默认值为 0。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 为最大和最小大小设置才会生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>必须大于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>，都必须为大于 0。
尝试将此属性设置为小于 0 的值将导致正在使用的 0 值。 如果您设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>的值大于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>设置的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>。 设置的效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize%2A>为相同的值是限制到单个字体大小的大小选择。
点大小为 0 时，没有字体大小限制。
